review_text: I replaced my KitchenAid mini chopper with the Cuisinart because of the price and it was available in red. It's a nice little appliance and works well but it doesn't seem to be as sturdy as my former KitchenAid. My old chopper lasted for 12 years so hopefully this will give me at least a decade of service.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
